name: Grumbletooth Ironhide
slogan: Old Ways Preferred, Better Times Ahead
response: Grim and grumpy, Grumbletooth Ironhide isn’t one for change—at least not yet. He’d rather things shift in a better direction, but hey, smashing the old ways takes effort, and he’s not quite there yet. Insurance? Oh, that’s a whole different level of hate. Grumbletooth would chuck it into the nearest abyss without a second thought. Pharma, on the other hand? That’s a friend in his book. Why? Maybe he’d even share his last grubby insect with it if needed. Crypto? Well, crypto exists, and that’s good enough for him—no need to get all worked up about it. Grumbletooth doesn’t snarl or snort; just a lazy shrug and a scratch behind his ear. Old-school charm, anyone?
